PlacePicker.IntentBuilder().Description: Create a new builder for launching the Place Picker UI.

Returns: The current Intent being configured by this builder.
build(android.content.Context).Description: Retrieve the Intent as configured so far by the Builder.

setLatLngBounds(com.google.android.gms.m.Description: Sets a starting @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#LatLngBounds_E@ for the map. This will be used in the initial query. If unspecified, starts at the device's current location.

ClassDesc: Builder for a Place Picker launch intent. After setting the optional parameters, call @B_com#google#android#gms#location#places#ui#PlacePicker#IntentBuilder#build_E@ and pass the intent to @B_android#app#Activity#startActivityForResult_E@.
